All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
CardAdapter
Inspiration taken from https://github.com/bel3arabyapps/ListView-and-CardView This class is the adapter to be used to display the Event Cards in a listView
DatabaseSynchronization
This is a class to synchronize the profile database and the event database.
DatabaseTools
This is a class that contains database tools.
EventActivity
This class allows the user to browse all events in the database.
EventCard
This class handles the Event Cards to be placed in the Events List in the Browse Events screen.
EventCreateActivity
 
EventCreateQRActivity
 
EventDatabaseControl
This is a class that controls the interaction between event data and the database.
EventDetailActivity
This class represents a single event.
EventQRActivity
 
MainActivity
This class manages the opening of the app and determines whether the user profile needs to be created.
ProfileActivity
This class displays the users profile information on the screen.
ProfileDatabaseControl
This is a class that controls the interaction between profile data and the database.
ProfileEditActivity
This class allows the user to edit their profile information.
QRCodeGenerator
QRCodeGenerator is a utility class responsible for generating QR code bitmaps.
QRScannerActivity
QRScannerActivity is an activity class responsible for handling QR code scanning.
